thread.title: SAN BERNARDINO: Library to host free play
thread.title_full: SAN BERNARDINO: Library to host free play - Press Enterprise

author: The Press-Enterprise
title: SAN BERNARDINO: Library to host free play
text:
STAFF REPORT
Published: Oct. 2, 2015 2:56 p.m. SAN BERNARDINO: Library to host free play Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Actor Duffy Hudson as Edgar Allen Poe. COURTESY OF CLARENCE ALFORD PHOTOGRAPHY Related article » The Feldheym Central Library will present a one-man play about Edgar Allan Poe at 6 p.m. Tuesday, Oct. 6. The play, “In the Shadow of the Raven,” stars actor Duffy Hudson. Admission is free.
Duffy says on his website that he has performed as Poe over 1,000 times and provides the writer’s voice at the Poe House and Museum in Fordham, N.Y.
The Feldheym Central library is at 555 W. Sixth St., San Bernardino.
Information: Linda Yeh, 909-381-8238
Contact the writer: community@pe.com
